video.title: The Writers' Room
video.synopsis: The Writers' Room, hosted by Academy Award winning writer, Jim Rash, gets real with the most innovative voices in TV today. Join us for a frank and revealing conversation about what we all love: television!

episodes.synopsis: Visit the creative team behind "Breaking Bad" as the writers divulge stories for a show recently named one of the best ever written.
episodes.title: Breaking Bad

episodes.synopsis: Pay a visit to the team behind "Parks and Recreation," the show that skewers small-town politics and features one of America's most energetic comics.
episodes.title: Parks and Recreation

episodes.synopsis: Go behind the scenes of "Dexter," the show about a serial killer with a strict moral code. Get rare insights from Michael C. Hall and Scott Buck.
episodes.title: Dexter

episodes.synopsis: Go inside "New Girl," the cult comedy about an adorkable girl and her three male roommates who are looking to make their way in the big city.
episodes.title: New Girl

episodes.synopsis: Join David Benioff and D.B. Weiss, the co-creators of "Game of Thrones," the hit HBO series based on the books by George R.R.Martin.
episodes.title: Game of Thrones

episodes.synopsis: Go behind one of the scariest and most unique TV series, "American Horror Story," with creators Ryan Murphy and Brad Falchuck, also from "Glee."
episodes.title: American Horror Story
